card.name: Bound // Determined
card.property: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Exile this card. // Other spells you control can't be countered this turn. Draw a card.

alternate.name: Bound
alternate.property: Sacrifice a creature. Return up to X cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of colors that creature was. Exile this card.

alternate.name: Determined
alternate.property: Other spells you control can't be countered this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Crime // Punishment

alternate.name: Crime
alternate.property: Put target creature or enchantment card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

alternate.name: Punishment
alternate.property: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with mana value X.

card.name: Hide // Seek

alternate.name: Hide
alternate.property: Put target artifact or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.

alternate.name: Seek
alternate.property: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. You gain life equal to its mana value. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Hit // Run

alternate.name: Hit
alternate.property: Target player sacrifices an artifact or creature of their choice. Hit deals damage to that player equal to that permanent's mana value.

alternate.name: Run
alternate.property: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking creature.

card.name: Odds // Ends

alternate.name: Odds
alternate.property: Flip a coin. If it comes up heads, counter target instant or sorcery spell. If it comes up tails, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

alternate.name: Ends
alternate.property: Target player sacrifices two attacking creatures of their choice.

card.name: Pure // Simple

alternate.name: Pure
alternate.property: Destroy target multicolored permanent.

alternate.name: Simple
alternate.property: Destroy all Auras and Equipment.

card.name: Research // Development

alternate.name: Research
alternate.property: Shuffle up to four cards you own from outside the game into your library.

alternate.name: Development
alternate.property: Create a 3/1 red Elemental creature token unless any opponent has you draw a card. Repeat this process two more times.

card.name: Rise // Fall

alternate.name: Rise
alternate.property: Return target creature card from a graveyard and target creature on the battlefield to their owners' hands.

alternate.name: Fall
alternate.property: Target player reveals two cards at random from their hand, then discards each nonland card revealed this way.

card.name: Supply // Demand

alternate.property: Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

alternate.name: Demand
alternate.property: Search your library for a multicolored card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Trial // Error

alternate.name: Trial

alternate.name: Error

card.property: When a player other than this creature's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, this creature deals 7 damage to the player.
